page.title: 17REPORTS ON FARM VISITS
page.content:
Ponies,goats and farm dogs. {OTHER FARMS VISITED. HINTON MARSH.MIXED.{EARLSCOURT.MIXED. {LOWER EARLSCOURT.MIXED.}LOWER.MIXED. BREACH.MIXED.{RED HOUSE.DAIRY AND {EGGS. } HORPIT.MIXED/ BEES.{HOME.MIXED. {SHARPS.MIXED.}UNDERDOWN.MIXED. {FOXBRIDGE.MIXED. {MARSH.CHICKEN.
All the farms had cows either beef or dairy,calves and a cerial crop usually winter wheat or barley.Only one farmer had sheep and he said there was no money in sheep farming. There are lots of smaller farms all doing the same things.Hay and Silage are the jobs which occupy the farmers most.Some farms fed their animals by computer.
